Answer on that question is required: Odpowiedź na to pytanie jest obowiązkowa
This address does not seem to have a nor: Podany adres mailowy nie wygląda na poprawny.
Your password must contain at least 8 ch: Twoje hasło musi zawierać co najmniej 8 znaków, w tym 1 cyfrę.
Please agree on all required consents to: Zaakceptuj wszystkie zgody, aby korzystać z serwisu
I accept the {{htmltag}}Terms and Condit: Akceptuję {{htmltag}}regulamin korzystania z serwisu{{endhtmltag}} firmy Cleeng.
I accept {{htmltag}}Terms and Conditions: Akceptuję {{htmltag}}regulamin korzystania z serwisu{{endhtmltag}} firmy Cleeng.
There are no payment methods configured: Nie ustawiono jeszcze zadnej metody płatności
You will now be charged {{currency}}{{pr: You will now be charged {{currency}}{{price}} (plus applicable taxes) and will be renewed on {{renewalDate}} at the same price.
If you choose your plan, you will be abl: Wybierz plan, aby móc zarządzać swoimi subskrypcjami
The section will show you recent transac: W tej sekcji, po dokonaniu pierwszej płatności, znajdziesz listę transakcji
Your {{translatedTitle}} free trial will: Your {{translatedTitle}} free trial will end on {{formattedExpiresAt}}.
If you would like to proceed with cancel: If you would like to proceed with cancelling your subscription, please select 'Unsubscribe' below, and your subscription will be cancelled as of {{formattedExpiresAt}}. Until then, you will continue to have access to all of your current subscription features. Before you go, please let us know why you're leaving.
Your subscription switch is still pendin: Your subscription switch is still pending. You will switch to {{scheduledSwitchTitle}} and be charged a new price.
By clicking the button below you can res: Klikając poniższy przycisk możesz odnowić subskrypcję. Twój kolejny rachunek będzie
button you agree to renew your current p: zgadzasz się na odnowienie subskrypcji. Twója opłata wyniesie
Twoja subskrypcja została pomyślnie odnowiona. Twoja opłata wyniesie
You will be unsubscribed from your curre: Twoja subskrypcja zostanie wyłączona po kliknięciu w przycisk
button below. Before you go, please let: Zanim to zrobisz, poinformuj nas, dlaczego zdecydowałeś się zrezygnować z subskrypcji:
Twoja subskrypcja została pomyślnie wyłączona. Twój dostęp do treści wygaśnie
Content I like has ended: Treści które lubię nie są już dostępne
Your brand new account is waiting for yo: Twoje nowe konto już na Ciebie czeka. Pozostał tylko jeden krok. Prosimy Cię o zapoznanie się z warnunkami przed przejściem do serwisu.
A change in our terms: Zmiana w warunkach korzystania z serwisu
One of our mandatory terms has been upda: Jedne z wymaganych warunków korzystania z serwisu został zaktualizowany. Wyraź zgodę aby kontynuować
We have updated our terms and conditions: Zaktualizowaliśmy regulamin, do którego masz dostęp przez zakładkę 'Aktualizacja profilu'. Poświęć kilka minut aby go przeczytać
One of our mandatory terms has been upda: Zaktualizowano warunki korzystania z serwisu. Zaakceptuj zgody wymagane oraz zapoznaj się z zaktualizowanymi zgodami marketingowymi
Zapoznaj się ze zmianami aby kontynuować
If you want to reset your password, clic: Kliklnij przycisk 'Zresetuj hasło' żeby otrzymać instrukcję resetu hasła na adres email
Please check your email inbox and follow: Sprawdź swoją skrzynkę e-mail i postępuj zgodnie z instrukcjami, aby zresetować hasło. Kiedy będziesz gotowy, kliknij ‘kontynuuj‘, aby wylogować się i zalogować przy użyciu nowego hasła.
Please confirm your password to proceed: Proszę potiwerdzić hasło przed zmianą aktualnego adresu email
Switching from a paid to a free offer is: Zmiana planu na darmowy jest niemożliwa
Start by selecting the plan that would l: Zacznij od wybrania planu, który chcesz zmienić
This plan is {{htmltag}}currently unavai: This plan is {{htmltag}}currently unavailable{{endhtmltag}} in your country or region
Another switch is already in progress. W: Another switch is already in progress. Wait until the process finalization
It looks like you already have access to: Wygląda na to, że masz już dostęp do tej oferty
Looks like there aren't any options for: Wygląda na to, że nie ma opcji zmiany Twojego planu na inny
You are at the end of the billing cycle: Jesteś na końcu okresu rozliczeniowego dla swojej aktualnej oferty.
Once the new one starts, you can switch: Gdy rozpocznie się nowy okres, będzisz miał mozliwość przejścia na nową ofertę.
Your payment method does not allow switc: Twoja metoda płatności nie pozwala na zmianę planu z tego miejsca
If you signed up via a mobile app, it ma: Jeżeli kupiłeś ofertę przez aplikację mobilna jest szansa, że możesz go tam zmienić.
You can't change your subscription if a: You can't change your subscription if a coupon was applied. To change plan, please cancel your current subscription and purchase a new one
It looks like you can't change your curr: Wygląda na to, że nie możesz zmienić swojego planu.
Your current coupon will not apply to th: Wcześniej zaaplikowany kupon nie przestanie działać. Jeśli posiadasz kupon dla nowej oferty, będziesz mógł go zaaplikować po zmianie planu.
Your pause request has been confirmed.
Note, the presented price does not inclu: Note, the presented price does not include taxes.
We have been unable to change your plan: We have been unable to change your plan to {{ title }} as an error occurred. Sorry for the inconvenience, please try again.
This is not a valid coupon code for this: Podany kupon nie jest poprawny dla wybranej oferty.
Ups. Coś poszło nie tak. Spróbuj ponownie później.
Set up a new payment method for your acc: Ustaw nową metodę płatności dla twojego konta
Ups, coś poszło nie tak! Spróbuj ponownie...
Update your current payment method, or a: Edytuj twoją metodę płatności lub dodaj nową.
Your payment details have been updated: Twoje dane płatności zostały poprawnie zaktualizowane
By clicking the REMOVE button you will d: Kliknięcie w przycisk USUŃ skutkuje usunięciem danych płatności.
Any subscriptions connected with this pa: Subskrypcje połączone z tą metodą płatności nie zostaną odnowione dopóki nie zostanie dodana nowa metoda płatności.
Paying with PayPal is easy. Click the bu: Paying with PayPal is easy. Click the button below and sign in to your PayPal account.
Note, PayPal is subject to an additional: Note, PayPal is subject to an additional 8% fee that will be added to your next payments.
It looks like your payments cannot be ma: Wygląda na to, że Twoje płatności nie mogą być tutaj edytowane
This means that your payment information: Oznacza to, że Twoje dane płatności nie mogą zostać zmienione w tym miejscu.
Renews automatically. Cancel anytime you: Automatyczne odnawianie subskrypcji. Zrezygnuj w dowolnym momencie.
You will be charged {{price}}exTax after: Twoje konto zostanie obciążone kwotą {{price}} bez VAT po {{period}}.
Your payment was not processed. Please,: Płatność nie została wykonana. Spróbuj ponownie
Payment method not supported. Try differ: Wybrana metoda płatności nie jest wspierana. Wybierz inną metodę płatności
Płatność nie powiodła się. Spróbuj ponownie
Click ‘Continue with PayPal‘ to complete: Click ‘Continue with PayPal‘ to complete your purchase.
Click ‘Continue with PayPal‘ to complete your purchase. Note, PayPal is subject to an additional 8% fee that will be added to your next payments.
We are sorry! The content you are trying: Przykro nam! Zawartość do której próbujesz uzyskać dostęp nie jset dostępna w Twoim kraju
We are sorry! This offer is no longer av: Przykro nam, ale ta oferta nie jest juz dostępna.
Good news! Your account already gives yo: Dobre wieści! Twoje konto posiada dostęp do zawartości dostępnej z tym planem.
We’re sorry to see you go!: We’re sorry to see you go!
You might want to pause your subscriptio: You might want to pause your subscription instead or find another plan that will suit you better
Your current plan will be paused for {{: Your current plan will be paused for {{ pausePeriod }}
How about a plan downgrade instead of ca: How about a plan downgrade instead of cancellation?
Here are the plans that might suit your: Here are the plans that might suit your needs:
You can resume your subscription at any: You can resume your subscription at any time.
pausesubscriptionpopup-info: On your next billing cycle ({{ pauseStartingDate }}) your subscription pause will go into effect. While your subscription is paused, you won’t be charged for, and you won’t have access to, {{ offerTitle }}. You can resume your {{ offerTitle }} subscription at any time.
pausesubscriptionpopup-note: Or, if you don`t do anything, your subscription will automatically resume at the start of the next season. When your subscription resumes, you will be billed the current monthly subscription fee for your plan.
pausesubscriptionpopup-confirm: You will continue to have access to your subscription through your current billing cycle. The pause will go into effect on {{ pauseStartingDate }}
We have been unable to pause your plan a: We have been unable to pause your plan as an error occurred. Sorry for the inconvenience, please try again.
unsubscribe-popup.title: Manage your plan
unsubscribe-popup.pause-title: Would you like to pause your subscription instead?
unsubscribe-popup.pause-question: Need to step away? No problem.
unsubscribe-popup.pause-description: Pause your subscription until the beginning of next season, you can resume at any time.
switchplanpopup-info: You are about to change your plan from {{ fromOfferTitle }} to {{ toOfferTitle }}.
switchplanpopup-info-immediatewithoutpro: You will be immediately granted access to your selected plan and charged a new price {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} on your next billing date {{ expiresAt }}
switchplanpopup-info-immediateandchargew: You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and immediately granted access to your selected plan. The remaining value from the previous subscription will be refunded. You will continue to be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis until you cancel.
switchplanpopup-info-deferred: You will continue to have access to {{ currentPlan }} until {{ expiresAt }}. From that time you will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis for your new subscription.
switchplanpopup-info-immediateandchargef: You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and immediately granted access to the selected plan. You will continue to be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} a recurring basis until you cancel.
switchplanpopup-info-immediateandchargew: You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }}. You will also be fully refunded for your previous subscription. You will continue to be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis until you cancel.
switchplanpopup-confirm-immediatewithout: You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee will be {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} starting from {{ expiresAt }}.
switchplanpopup-confirm-immediateandchar: You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee is {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} starting from now.
switchplanpopup-confirm-deferred: You have successfully requested the switch to {{ newPlan }}. You will have access to your new plan on {{ expiresAt }} and be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }}.
switchplanpopup-confirm-immediateandchar: You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee will be {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} starting from now.
You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee will be {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} starting from now.
switchplanpopup-info-immediateandchargew: You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and immediately granted access to the selected plan.
switchplanpopup-confirm-immediateandchar: You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee will be {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} starting from now.
switchplanpopup-info-immediatewithtimepr: You will be immediately granted access to your selected plan. Your next billing date will be changed and pushed towards, based on the time left on your previous subscription. From that time, you will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis.
switchplanpopup-info-immediateandchargew: You will be immediately charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and granted access to the selected plan. Your next billing date will be changed and pushed towards, based on the time left on your previous subscription.
switchplanpopup-confirm-immediatewithtim: You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee will be {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} and you will be charged on a recurring basis until you cancel.
switchplanpopup-confirm-immediateandchar: You have successfully changed your plan to {{ newPlan }}. Your new fee will be {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} and you will be charged on a recurring basis until you cancel.
If you choose your plan, you will be abl: If you choose your plan, you will be able to manage your offers here.
myaccount-nooffers-withlink: If you <2>choose your plan</2>, you will be able to manage your offers here.
Your switch is pending. You will have ac: Your switch is pending. You will have access to {{translatedTitle}} until {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}. From that time you will be charged your new price and will have access to {{translatedSwitchTitle}}. You can cancel this at any time.
Your switch is pending and should be com: Your switch is pending and should be completed within few minutes. You will be charged a new price immediately and get access to {{translatedSwitchTitle}}. You can cancel anytime.

Your switch is pending and should be completed within few minutes. You will be charged a new price starting {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}.{{translatedSwitchTitle}} renews automatically. You can cancel anytime.
How about a plan switch instead of cance: How about a plan switch instead of cancellation?
Here are the plans that might match your: Here are the plans that might match your needs:
Or still wants to cancel a subscription?: Or still wants to cancel a subscription?
Your {{switchDirection}} to {{switchOffe: Your {{switchDirection}} to {{switchOfferTitle}} is still pending and will take effect on {{baseOfferExpirationDate}}. If you decide to cancel the switch, you will keep access to current plan and be charged {{baseOfferPrice}} on the next billing date.
You have successfully canceled your {{sw: You have successfully canceled your {{switchDirection}} to {{switchOfferTitle}}. You will be charged a current price on {{baseOfferExpirationDate}} and keep access to {{baseOfferTitle}}.
cancel-pause-popup.title: Cancel pause
cancel-pause-popup.information-text: Your current plan will be paused starting on {{baseOfferExpirationDate}}. Cancel the pause to resume access to your {{ pausedOfferTitle }} subscription. While your subscription is paused, you won’t be charged for, and you won’t have access to, {{ pausedOfferTitle }}.
cancel-pause-popup.question-text: Would you like to cancel the pause request?
cancel-pause-popup.confirmation-title: Your pause request has been canceled.
cancel-pause-popup.confirmation-text: Your access to your {{ pausedOfferTitle }} subscription will continue.
offer-card.info-box.pause-information-te: Your current plan will be paused starting on {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}. While your subscription is paused, you won’t be charged for, and you won’t have access to, {{ translatedTitle }}. You can cancel this pause request at any time.

legal-notes.trial.period-week: After any free trial and/or promotional period, you will be charged {{readablePrice}}{{ readablePeriod }} or the then-current price plus applicable taxes on a recurring basis. If you do not cancel the service during its free trial period, you will be charged. Your subscription will automatically continue until you cancel. To cancel, log into <4>your account and click 'Manage Subscription'.

failed-payment-page.title: Oops! Something went wrong
failed-payment-page.subtitle: We weren't able to process your payment.
failed-payment-page.desc-refused: To complete your purchase, please <1>try again</1> using a different payment method.
failed-payment-page.desc-error: To complete your purchase, please <1>try again</1>.
grace-period-error: Your subscription couldn't be renewed due to a payment method issue. Please <2>update it</2> to avoid losing access to the content.

thank-you-page.manage-text: You can manage your account from <1>here</1>.
update-payment-details.refused: We weren’t able to update your payment method. Please try again.
update-payment-details.error: We weren’t able to update your payment details. Please try again using different payment method.
legal-notes-acknowledge: By clicking 'Pay', I expressly acknowledge and agree to the full <2>Terms of Service</2>.
unsubscribe-info: If you would like to proceed with cancelling your subscription, please select 'Unsubscribe' below, and your subscription will be cancelled as of {{ formattedExpiresAt }}. Until then, you will continue to have access to all of your current subscription features. Before you go, please let us know why you're leaving.
resume-subscription-popup.title: Resume plan
resume-subscription-popup.error-text: We have been unable to resume your plan as an error occurred. Sorry for the inconvenience, please try again.
resume-subscription-popup.info: Click the button below to resume your {{ planName }} subscription.
resume-subscription-popup.question: Do you want to apply the change now?
resume-subscription-popup.success-header: Your {{ planName }} subscription has been resumed
resume-subscription-popup.success-text: You have successfully resumed your plan {{ planName }}.
offer-bank-consent-copy.free-subscriptio: You accept the terms and conditions of this agreement and that your account will be charged €0.10 for authentication purposes. This amount will be refunded once the transaction is completed. And your account will be debited on a recurring basis for the full subscription amount.
